attributes.action: Put continuing pressure on the USA to close Guantanamo
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In Guantanamo people are tortured and puniched without trial which is fundemendally against human rights. This is all the more important as many detained are not even US citizens. There have been steps towards the closure of gunatanamo by Obama but more needs to be done, and with the great friendship between our nations we can hopefully end this
